page.title: 09THE VILLAGE POLICEMAN
page.content: P.C.PAUL TURNER is our village {POLICEMAN.}He lives at The Police House,The Launches,West Lulworth. He has been a Policeman for 17 years and has been here for the past 2 years.He works at Wool Police Station,5 miles away,on various shifts which change at regular intervals.He also drives around in a Patrol Car and has a special link with Lulworth Camp. He carries a two way radio, hand- cuffs,a notebook and truncheon.He has 1 cap(for the car)and 2 helmets; one is specially reinforced for very dangerous situations.Dorset Police have a different uniform from the other Constabularies.(Trial area). Community Policing is an important part of his job.He has valuable local links, especially with the School.Here he gives talks,shows films and takes an annual Cycling Proficiency Course.
